title: TFT BETA PASS REWARDS
body: I just read TFT beta pass was turned off yesterday. So is there no way to claim rewards? I've got 3600 points but couldn't claim that Tier 4 TFT launch Icon. Sad......

replies.body:
The same thing happened to me, so I sent a ticket into Riot Games support with a screenshot of my TFT page & points and they manually credited the icon to me.
Good luck!
